column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was so excited to go on my first trip to Florida by airplane .
#id=2
#text=I made sure to buy a window seat so I could see the beautiful view from high up in the sky .
#id=3
#text=I listened carefully to the flight attendant as she gave her speech about safety precautions .
#id=4
#text=After she finished the pilot got on the loud speaker and informed us that we will be taking off shortly .
#id=5
#text=He told us what time we will be landing in Florida and even the temperature it will be when we landed .
#id=6
#text=He then told us to buckle our seat belt and turn off any electronic devices we may have with us .
#id=7
#text=A couple minutes later the engine came to life and the plane started moving towards the runway .
#id=8
#text=When it reach the runway it started to speed up very fast and after a minute I felt the plane lift off of the ground .
#id=9
#text=I looked out the window and saw us leaving the ground .
#text=When we reach our cruising altitude the pilot informed us it was now safe for us to take off our seat belts .
#text=I looked out the window and found myself amazed as we soared over the clouds .
